Class TimeSlotManager

Models.TimeSlotManager

public class TimeSlotManager extends Object implements TimeSlotInterface

  • Constructor Details

    • TimeSlotManager

      public TimeSlotManager()

  • Method Details

    • initializeObjects

      public static void initializeObjects()
      Initializes the list of TimeSlot objects by reading data from the CSV file. Existing time slots in the list will be cleared before loading new data.

    • saveTimeSlots

      public static void saveTimeSlots()
      Saves the current list of TimeSlot objects to the CSV file. The CSV file will include headers and all time slot data.

    • getTimeSlotsByDoctorID

      public static List<TimeSlot> getTimeSlotsByDoctorID(String doctorID)
      Retrieves a list of TimeSlot objects associated with a specific doctor ID.
      Parameters:
      doctorID - the ID of the doctor
      Returns:
      a list of TimeSlot objects for the specified doctor

    • getAvailableTimeSlots

      public static List<TimeSlot> getAvailableTimeSlots()
      Retrieves a list of available TimeSlot objects.
      Returns:
      a list of TimeSlot objects with status AVAILABLE

    • getTimeSlotByID

      public static TimeSlot getTimeSlotByID(String timeSlotID)
      Retrieves a TimeSlot object by its unique ID.
      Parameters:
      timeSlotID - the unique ID of the time slot
      Returns:
      the TimeSlot object if found, or null if not found

    • createTimeSlot

      public static void createTimeSlot(String doctorID, LocalDateTime start, LocalDateTime end)
      Creates a new TimeSlot object and adds it to the list. The time slot is automatically assigned a unique ID and set to AVAILABLE status.
      Parameters:
      doctorID - the ID of the doctor associated with the time slot
      start - the start time of the time slot
      end - the end time of the time slot

    • updateTimeSlotStatus

      public static void updateTimeSlotStatus(String timeSlotID, ScheduleStatus status)
      Updates the status of an existing TimeSlot object.
      Parameters:
      timeSlotID - the unique ID of the time slot to update
      status - the new ScheduleStatus of the time slot
